import { Employee } from '@/module/employee'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators} from '@angular/forms'; import {STEPPER_GLOBAL_OPTIONS} from '@angular/cdk/stepper'; @Component({ selector: 'app-basic-details-form', templateUrl: './basic-details-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./basic-details-form.component.scss'], providers: [{ provide: STEPPER_GLOBAL_OPTIONS, useValue: {showError: true} }] }) export class BasicDetailsFormComponent implements OnInit{ employee: Employee = new Employee(); firstFormGroup: FormGroup; constructor(private _formBuilder: FormBuilder) { } ngOnInit() { this.firstFormGroup = this._formBuilder.group({ epf_no: ['', Validators.required], }); } }
